comments.body:
I would use a `Partial<LicenseCheckerWebpackPlugin.Options>` here. A fully-optional interface is a bit of an anti-pattern as it will overmatch (e.g. an object which has none of the properties in `Options` but has extras, will match).

You can then make everything in `Options` required (remove the `?`). Just a suggestion.
That would be better but not required hence merging.
Thanks for the suggestion. I've implemented it here: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/34282
